title: go_spec: ref to #Package_clauses instead of #Package_clause
body:
by **soggof**: 
Just a minor correction, in the specification page http://golang.org/doc/go_spec.html
"package clause" in the line
"If the PackageName is omitted, it defaults to the identifier specified in the
package clause of the imported package."
should link to
http://golang.org/doc/go_spec.html#Package_clause
not
http://golang.org/doc/go_spec.html#Package_clauses

thank you
